foreignData.name: Verflüchtigende Peinigerin // Heimtückischer Nebel
foreignData.text:
Fluchsicher, Unzerstörbar
Der Heimtückische Nebel kann nicht blocken und nicht geblockt werden.
Immer wenn der Heimtückische Nebel angreift und nicht geblockt wird, kannst du {2}{B} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, transformiere ihn.

foreignData.name: Atormentadora escurridiza // Niebla insidiosa
foreignData.text:
Antimaleficio, indestructible.
La Niebla insidiosa no puede bloquear y no puede ser bloqueada.
Siempre que la Niebla insidiosa ataque y no sea bloqueada, puedes pagar {2}{B}. Si lo haces, transfórmala.

foreignData.name: Persécutrice insaisissable // Brume insidieuse
foreignData.text:
Défense talismanique, indestructible
La Brume insidieuse ne peut pas bloquer et ne peut pas être bloquée.
À chaque fois que la Brume insidieuse attaque et qu'elle n'est pas bloquée, vous pouvez payer {2}{B}. Si vous faites ainsi, transformez-la.

foreignData.name: Torturatrice Elusiva // Nebbia Insidiosa
foreignData.text:
Anti-malocchio, indistruttibile
La Nebbia Insidiosa non può bloccare e non può essere bloccata.
Ogniqualvolta la Nebbia Insidiosa attacca e non viene bloccata, puoi pagare {2}{B}. Se lo fai, trasformala.

foreignData.name: 神出鬼没な拷問者 // 陰湿な霧
foreignData.text:
呪禁、破壊不能
陰湿な霧ではブロックできず、陰湿な霧はブロックされない。
陰湿な霧が攻撃してブロックされないたび、あなたは{2}{B}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、これを変身させる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー ― - エレメンタル

foreignData.name: 잡히지 않는 고문관 // 은밀히 퍼지는 안개
foreignData.text:
방호, 무적
은밀히 퍼지는 안개는 방어할 수 없으며 방어될 수 없다.
은밀히 퍼지는 안개가 공격하고 방어되지 않을 때마다, 당신은 {2}{B}를 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 은밀히 퍼지는 안개를 변신시킨다.

foreignData.name: Atormentadora Elusiva // Névoa Insidiosa
foreignData.text:
Resistência a magia, indestrutível
Névoa Insidiosa não pode bloquear e não pode ser bloqueada.
Toda vez que Névoa Insidiosa ataca e não é bloqueada, você pode pagar {2}{B}. Se fizer isso, transforme-a.

foreignData.name: Неуловимая Мучительница // Коварный Туман
foreignData.text:
Порчеустойчивость, Неразрушимость
Коварный Туман не может блокировать и не может быть заблокирован.
Каждый раз, когда Коварный Туман атакует и не заблокирован, вы можете заплатить {2}{B}. Если вы это делаете, трансформируйте его.

foreignData.name: 匿迹拷问人 // 隐伏迷雾
foreignData.text:
辟邪，不灭
隐伏迷雾不能进行阻挡，也不能被阻挡。
每当隐伏迷雾攻击且未受阻挡时，你可以支付{2}{B}。若你如此作，转化它。

foreignData.name: 匿跡拷問人 // 隱伏迷霧
foreignData.text:
辟邪，不滅
隱伏迷霧不能進行阻擋，也不能被阻擋。
每當隱伏迷霧攻擊且未受阻擋時，你可以支付{2}{B}。若你如此作，轉化它。

name: Elusive Tormentor // Insidious Mist
originalText:
Hexproof, indestructible
Insidious Mist can't block and can't be blocked.
Whenever Insidious Mist attacks and isn't blocked, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, transform it.

rulings.text: You can activate Elusive Tormentor’s ability multiple times to discard multiple cards. Only the first instance of the ability to resolve will cause it to transform.

You can, all within one turn, attack with Elusive Tormentor, transform it into Insidious Mist before blockers are chosen, transform it back as its triggered ability resolves, and have it deal 4 combat damage.
Once blockers have been chosen, transforming Elusive Tormentor into Insidious Mist won’t cause it to become unblocked.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Shadows over Innistrad mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/shadows-over-innistrad-mechanics).

text:
Hexproof, indestructible
Insidious Mist can't block and can't be blocked.
Whenever Insidious Mist attacks and isn't blocked, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, transform it.
